Question 157) According to the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE), the average monthly income of Brazilian workers in 2000 was R $ 1 250.00. The 2010 Census showed that, in 2010, this value increased by 7.2% compared to 2000. This same institute projects that, by 2020, the average monthly income of Brazilian workers could be 10% higher than it was in 2010.
Assuming that the IBGE projections are held, the average monthly income of Brazilians in 2020 will be
A) R $ 1 340.00.
B) R $ 1 349.00.
C) R $ 1 375.00.
D) R $ 1 465.00.
E) R $ 1 474.00.
